Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Cinq Préludes, op. 16

1894 (nos. 1, 3), 1895 (nos. 2, 4–5)

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1. B major
  • 2. G-sharp minor
  • 3. G-flat major
  • 4. E-flat minor
  • 5. F-sharp major

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/8 · Pieces · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Könemann · K 213 · Preludes I · ed. Victor Ekimovsky
  • Peters · EP 9077c · Klavierwerke III / Préludes, Poèmes und andere Stücke · ed. Günter Philipp

1. B major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. G-sharp minor

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3.5

3. G-flat major

Scriabin wrote, but later struck out, an extended section in the middle of the prélude that roughly doubles the length of the piece.

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. E-flat minor

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

5. F-sharp major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
